Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Reconstructed necklace composed of three disc-shaped beads of carnelian alternating with three disc-shaped beads of light blue enamel. The carnelian beads could have been carved from pebbles picked up in the Nubian desert and the enamel could be from Egypt. The craftsmanship is of good quality.
